summary: Facebook is a popular social media platform with nearly 3 billion monthly users as of 2022. It was created in 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg and his Harvard roommates. Originally meant for Harvard students, it expanded to other universities and eventually became available to everyone over the age of 13. Users can create profiles, connect with friends, join groups, and share content. Facebook can be accessed on various devices and has become one of the most visited websites globally. However, it has also faced criticism for privacy concerns, spreading misinformation, and psychological effects on users.
title: Facebook
